radiographic_examinations.findings: No acute intrathoracic process and no signs of pneumoperitoneum.
1. No evidence of diverticulitis or colitis. 2. Persistent dilation of the common bile duct up to 1.5 cm, with mild intrahepatic biliary dilation.
The liver is diffusely echogenic with a smooth contour, no focal liver mass. CHD measures 5 mm, with sludge within the gallbladder and pericholecystic fluid.
